price: “O velikaši”, reče ona, “meni je dostavljeno jedno poštovanja vrijedno pismo.
arabic: قَالَتۡ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلۡمَلَؤُاْ إِنِّيٓ أُلۡقِيَ إِلَيَّ كِتَٰبٞ كَرِيمٌ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qālat yāayyuhā al-mala-u innī ul'qiya ilayya kitābun karīmun
